page.title: 07LIVING ON A NEW ESTATE
page.content: We live on the modern{Stadium } {Estate.}Our names are Claire & Michael our homes are only seven years old and we like the gardens.The streets on the estate are named after golf courses.The houses are compact,it is good because in the winter it is easy to heat.It has three bedrooms(one each for my brother and I and one for my parents).There is also a bathroom, kitchen and large{open plan sitting } {room,}with the stairs in the room.You can see right through the house. There is a field nearby called the {Jack Clark Park,}a bowling club and some shops.The{Greyhound Racing } Stadium used to be on this site.From our kitchen window we can see the sea. There is also the{Leas & Marine Park } to play in.There is a pond with ducks and a little steam train which goes all the way round the park.
